title: Solana Extends Investment Streak to 27 Weeks of Inflows: CoinShares
description: The one-time "Ethereum killer" remains the darling of institutional investors.

title: Celsius lawyer says revival plans include $450M in seed funding
description:
Bankrupt crypto lending firm Celsius has found a way to fund its proposed relaunch, according to reports from Bloomberg on Oct. 2. Christopher S. Koenig, a lawyer for Celsius, said during bankruptcy proceedings that the company intends to exit bankruptcy with $450 million in seed funding. That funding will come from Fahrenheit LLC, a group […]

The post Celsius lawyer says revival plans include $450M in seed funding appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: UK Government Urged to Review Chase Bank’s Policy to Decline Crypto Payments
description: Bitcoin Policy UK has urged the British government to review Chase Bank’s policy to decline all crypto payments. “It is, of course, the stated policy of this Government that the U.K. become a crypto asset hub, but it is hard to square this policy aim with the actions of this U.K.-regulated bank,” the crypto advocacy […]
